content: joined to the left of previous square set up 1 row start on upper corner of left edge of previous square pick up and knit 32 st from double loops of edge sts then cast on 31 st with backwards loop method 2 row 31 st p 1 k 31 st ws continue working like first square next row of squares joining above first row of squares first square second and following row set up 1 row co 32 st pick up and k 31 st from double loops of edge sts on upper edge of first square below 2 row 31 st p 1 k 31 st ws continue working like previous squares second and following squares set up 1 row start on upper corner of left edge of previous square pick up and knit 32 st from double loops of edge sts pick up and k 31 st from double loops of edge sts on upper edge of square below 2 row 31 st p 1 k 31 st ws continue working like previous squares add as many squares as you like to create a blanket in the size of your choice and don t forget to weave in the ends most of all have fun and happy knitting abbreviations k knit p purl co cast on st s stitch es rs/ws right side/wrong side i hope you enjoy this free pattern please never hesitate to get in touch if you have a question and i d love to see your version of song song find me as paperdag on ravelry and instagram and my channel ziawoolz studiobuzz on youtube may 2019 ziawoolz llc www ziawoolz com
